#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	int n;
	
	
	while(t--){
		long long int ans=1;
		long int a,b,c,d,x,y,max,count=0,tmp=1,p=0;
		cin>>n;
		ans = n;
		cin>>a>>b>>c>>d;
		cin>>x>>y;
		if((x==1) && (y==1))cout<<n<<endl;
		else if((x==1)&&(y==2))cout<<b<<endl;
		else if((x==1)&&(y==1))cout<<a<<endl;
		else if((x==2)&&(y==1))cout<<c<<endl;
		else if((x==2)&&(y==2))cout<<d<<endl;
		else{
			max = x>y?x:y;
			while(tmp<max){
				tmp*=2;
				count++;
			}
	//		cout<<count<<" log of max base 2"<<endl;
			while(count--){
				p = (int)pow(2,count);
		//		cout<<p<<" power of 2,count\n";
				if((x>p)&&(y>p)){ans*=d;y-=p;x-=p; }
				else if((x>p)&&(y<=p)){ans*=c;x-=p;}
				else if((x<=p)&&(y>p)){ans*=b;y-=p;}
				else if((x<=p)&&(y<=p)){ans*=a;}
			}
			cout<<ans<<endl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
